options.name: connect
options.description: Connect this channel to TNTClient chat

options.name: disconnect
options.description: Disconnect this channel to TNTClient chat

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to disconnect from TNTClient chat. <Long>

options.name: send
options.description: Allows you to send a message to all players or to one selected player.

options.name: message
options.description: The message you want to send.

options.name: receiver
options.description: The recipient of the message, if the field is not specified, the message is public.

options.name: server
options.description: Specifies the server on which the message will be visible.
